price: No new reminder comes to them from the Most Compassionate except that they turn away from it.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
